reports.name: BasicAuthPasswordIdentityProvider
reports.comment: Identity provider my_remote_basic_auth_provider is supported in OCP4

reports.name: GitHubIdentityProvider
reports.comment: Identity provider github123456789 is supported in OCP4

reports.comment: Identity provider gitlab123456789 is supported in OCP4

reports.name: GoogleIdentityProvider
reports.comment: Identity provider google123456789123456789 is supported in OCP4

reports.name: HTPasswdPasswordIdentityProvider
reports.comment: Identity provider htpasswd_auth is supported in OCP4

reports.name: KeystonePasswordIdentityProvider
reports.comment: Identity provider my_keystone_provider is supported in OCP4

reports.name: LDAPPasswordIdentityProvider
reports.comment: Identity provider my_ldap_provider is supported in OCP4

reports.name: RequestHeaderIdentityProvider
reports.comment: Identity provider my_request_header_provider is supported in OCP4

reports.name: OpenIDIdentityProvider
reports.comment: Identity provider my_openid_connect is supported in OCP4

reports.name: Issuer
reports.comment: OCP4 requires an 'issuer' URL, please edit OAuth manifest file and configure this field

reports.name: AuthorizeTokenMaxAgeSeconds
reports.comment: Translation of AuthorizeTokenMaxAgeSeconds is not supported, it's value is 5 minutes in OCP4
Translation of AssetPublicURL is not supported
Translation of MasterPublicURL is not supported
Translation of MasterCA is not supported
Translation of MasterURL is not supported
Translation of GrantConfig is not supported
Translation of SessionConfig is not supported
